Have the following T206s for sale. Prices include delivery in the US.  Payment by check, mo, or Paypal gift. Regular Paypal add 3%. First commitment to purchase gets the card. 

Any questions, please let me know. Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]

Ed Willet - SGC 10 - $16
